channel.title: Dylan Conklin | DIPr Lab at PSU

item.title: BL(u)E CRAB
item.description: BL(u)E CRAB is a Flutter-based mobile app, which leverages various risk factors and dynamic thresholds to detect unwanted Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) trackers. It allows users to take a proactive approach to prevent unwanted tracking by allowing users to see a report about all surrounding devices of concern.
